review: This is a great device if you own pretty much all apple products. I love streaming videos from my iphone to my tv. I also like the fact that my photos from my phone display easily on the tv and it has Netflix and HBO go.
author: Sarah B

review: When I use Airplay to put my Macbook Air's screen on my TV, the audio doesn't come through. I did everything I could think of and went to Apple's support forums and learned this is a common problem ever since Apple's latest software update.For now, the only work around is unplug the power cord from the AppleTV and let it do a "hard" reboot, and to reboot my Macbook Air... then they will play nicely together for a session.When you think about it, AppleTV's OS, OSX Mavericks, iOS7 and iWork all have problems right now. Apple's software doesn't seem to be keeping pace quality-wise with its hardware these days.
author: Tom L. Pittman

review: If you eat, sleep, and breathe Apple then this device is probably STILL not for you.So! If you like your ultraviolet collections that were redeemable through Vudu/Flixster, don't expect any app for them any time soon.And! If you like watching Netflix, don't expect for it to have its latest updates which make Netflix as convenient as it is. expect to manually play every episode, THERE IS NO 'AUTOMATICALLY PLAY NEXT EPISODE' FEATURE!AND! If you just so happen to not have wifi, don't expect your device to operate... AT ALL. Even with a USB hard drive attached for local media./cry.
